department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: AMENDMENT TO RESPONSE DEADLINE CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be be submitted on September 15, 2022 by 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. This NPP is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C and covers a requirement from the following Product Categories of the SA: Product Category 6 – Support Space – Collaborative Furniture; and This requirement also contains products that are NON-SUPPLY ARRANGEMENT.
